summary: The Defense Production Act allows federal agencies to require companies to prioritize government contracts for medical supplies to address national emergencies, like COVID-19 . Federal agencies have used DPA authorities to expand production of COVID-related medical supplies. Federal agencies faced challenges using DPA authorities. title: COVID-19: Agencies Are Taking Steps to Improve Future Use of Defense Production Act Authorities
